lead_paragraph: Extremist clerics and secretive associations funded by Saudis and others have transformed a once-tolerant Muslim society into a font of extremism.

headline.print_headline: Making Kosovo Fertile Ground for ISIS
headline.main: How Kosovo Was Turned Into Fertile Ground for ISIS

snippet: Extremist clerics and secretive associations funded by Saudis and others have transformed a once-tolerant Muslim society into a font of extremism.
abstract: Saudi money and influence has worked to transform Kosovo, once-tolerant Muslim society at edge of Europe, into breeding ground for Muslim extremism in 17 years since American forces liberated territory from Serbian oppression; change, driven by obscure network of funding and extremist clerics, has occurred under watch of American officials (Series: Secrets of the Kingdom).

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
